name: zenobia-extension
description: Chrome extension for Zenobia AI agent

scripts.build:css: echo 'Using CDN for TailwindCSS and DaisyUI'
scripts.build:ts: bun build src/background.ts --outdir dist --target browser && bun build src/content-script.ts --outdir dist --target browser && bun build src/popup.ts --outdir dist --target browser && bun build src/sidepanel.ts --outdir dist --target browser
scripts.build: bun run build:icons && bun run build:css && bun run build:ts && bun run build:manifest && cp -r public/* dist/
